relevant_findings.general: Well appearing male lying in bed, NAD, A&Ox3
relevant_findings.neck: Supple, JVP not elevated, no LAD
relevant_findings.lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales or ronchi
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 + S2, no murmurs, rubs or gallops
relevant_findings.abdomen: Soft, non distended, mildly tender with pressure mid-epigastric area, diminished bowel sounds, no rebound tenderness or guarding
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm, no edema, 2+ DP pulses bilaterally
relevant_findings.neurological: CN II-XII intact, strength not specified bilaterally, proprioception, vibration, sensation intact

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Improvement of pain reported, no nausea or vomiting; pain remains localized to epigastrium.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Pain initially severe, then improved on presentation to the floor.
